      • resize

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resize(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                                  int width,
                                                  int height,
                                                  int scaleType)
        Scales an image to a new size.
        Parameters:
        image - The original image
        width - The new width
        height - The new height
        scaleType - The scaling type.
        1. TextureUtil.SCALE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOR
        2. TextureUtil.SCALE_BILINEAR
        3. TextureUtil.SCALE_BICUBIC
        Returns:
        Returns a TYPE_INT_RGB BufferedImage of the new size
